News

Media Contacts:

High resolution press photo, here.

The communications team cannot facilitate public records requests. Please refer to the AGO public records webpage for information on how to submit a request.

For media inquiries, please contact:

Nina Jenkins, Communications Director

  • Email: press@atg.wa.gov
  • Phone: 360-753-2727

 

Add yourself to Attorney General Brown's mailing list to subscribe to News Releases and other AGO newsletters.  

Subscribe to RSS feeds to receive the Latest News, AGO Opinions, Consumer Alerts.

You can also follow us on:  Twitter, YouTube, Instagram, and Facebook!
